data.title: Forms
data.meta_description: Use this form to apply for a driver improvement clinic license. Use this form to apply for a Driver Improvement Clinic instructor's license. Use this form to apply
data.text: This form is used by (1) learning drivers age 18 who hold a learner’s permit, (2) learning drivers age 19 and older who hold a learner’s permit but have not completed a Virginia approved driver training course, and (3) qualifying home-schooled students to verify the observation and completion of safe driving maneuvers before applying to take the road skills test at DMV.
